projectGridLines.title: Software(SDE Intern)
projectGridLines.description:
Description:

We are a digital product company. LifeGuru provides a unique blend of an opportunity to work on the

latest consumer technology in mobile app development (Flutter), Backend( Node.js), Generative AI &

LLM.

We are looking for students with the passion and capability for creating novel software solutions to

work in the space of Generative AI & LLM, mobile app development and back-end.

Skill sets:

• Current Tech Stack at LifeGuru

• Next.js/React for dynamic front-end development

• Flutter for versatile, cross-platform mobile solutions

• PostgreSQL & MongoDB for robust database management

• Node.js for efficient back-end operations using REST, Socket & WebRTC protocols.

• AWS for scalable cloud services

• Gemini & Vertex AI

• Python (PyTorch)

Traits expectation:

• Anyone who wants to experience the thrill of building an organization from the ground up.

• A person with high degree of Ownership. You have to have very high internal motivation to

own the project end to end and drive it to completion.

• Positive Approach to working at a startup. We are working together to build things.

• Work Hard & Smart: Building a startup is hard, and with limited resources, even harder. We

expect you to be a part of the Founding team, hence the attitude is expected to be similar

• Wants to be a Future Tech Founder: Being the next in line with Founders of LifeGuru.app,

the role offers perfect experience to become a tech founder in the next 3-5 years.

Expected learning:

• Work on real-world projects with global impact and we promise that whatever you create will

be LIVE during your internship

• Collaborate with a team of experienced professionals and entrepreneurs who have nurtured

brands like Starbucks, Licious, Milkbasket, RummyCircle

• Enhance your skills in a dynamic, fast-paced environment


• Contribute to a project that's at the forefront of technological innovation

Specific courses required for project execution:

• Must be someone who has extensive coding experience & is passionate about software

development

• Involvement in Coding Club/Tech Club of College is a plus

• Prior experience with some aspects of our current tech-stack is a plus.

• Experience with LLM, NLP, AI & ML is added bonus but not mandatory
